PedroPathing/com.pedropathing.util/CustomFilteredPIDFCoefficients

CustomFilteredPIDFCoefficients

public class CustomFilteredPIDFCoefficients

This is the CustomFilteredPIDFCoefficients class. This class handles holding coefficients for filtered PIDF controllers.

Anyi Lin - 10158 Scott's Bots

This creates a new CustomFilteredPIDFCoefficients with constant PID coefficients and a variable feedforward equation using a FeedForwardConstant.
